name: Tikal In Chaos Island
description:
Tikal In Chaos Island

Date:December 17th 2019

The Sequel To Knuckles In Seaside World

And The Last In The Knuckles In High World Trillogy

Here Is The Link To Play This Game

Here: http://flowlab.io/game/play/1213752

Control

Arrow Keys To Move

Spacebar To Jump

Story/Plot

After The Event Of Knuckles In Seaside World, Where Knuckles Beat Chaos In A Fight & Now That Knuckles is Kidnapped Somebody Need To Save Him.
A Month Later Tikal Was Living In Her Home, She Find Out Knuckles Got Kidnapped By Chaos.
It Up To Tikal To Save Knuckles & Stop Chaos Destroying The World.
